con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseClientToken = messageExchange.response.responseContent log.info responseClientToken
def parseJson = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseClientToken)
def actualToken = parseJson.access_token log.info actualToken
context def expectedToken = context.getTestCase.getPropertyValue("access_token") log.info expectedToken
assert expectedToken == actualStatus

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def responseClientToken = messageExchange.response.responseContent log.info responseClientToken
def parseJson = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseClientToken)
def actualToken = parseJson.access_token log.info actualToken
context def expectedToken = context.getTestCase.getPropertyValue("data.access_token") log.info expectedToken
assert expectedToken == actualToken
